description: This is a React component for the Dashboard page of a device remote management platform. It displays overview statistics (total devices, active/failed/completed jobs), quick action links, and supported protocols. The component fetches data from API endpoints and manages loading and error states.

methods.name: Dashboard
methods.description: React functional component rendering the dashboard page with statistics, quick actions, and protocol info.

calls: console.error('Failed to fetch dashboard stats:', err)
